author: zkfloof
content: has there been any thought wrt. intentionally spacing out network upgrades that reduce l2 tx fees vs rolling them out as soon as we possibly can?  Thinking in terms of 'Induced Demand', might it make sense to roll them out strategically?

author: zkfloof
content: would give a chance for more complex (+ more useful) l2 dapps to come around

author: zkfloof
content: and create space for other network upgrades to go through in the meantime

author: killari.
content: I think there is a wait until L2's come out to start to consider catering for them
